explains: v. 剔除，根除；对……不予考虑，把……排除在外；（比赛中）淘汰；铲除，杀害；（生理）排除，排泄；消去
wordGroup: eliminate illiteracy 扫盲，扫除文盲

sentences.en: This diet claims to eliminate toxins from the body.
sentences.cn: 这种饮食据称具有排除体内毒素的作用。

sentences.en: He declared war on the government and urged right-wingers to eliminate their opponents.
sentences.cn: 他向政府宣战并且力劝右翼分子们消灭他们的对手。

sentences.en: We called up three economists to ask how to eliminate the deficit and they obliged with very straightforward answers.
sentences.cn: 我们致电3位经济学家咨询消除赤字的方法，他们满足了我们的要求，给出了非常直接的答复。
